News

  1. Vidadi Iskenderli Dies Without Regaining Consciousness (updated)

    At 13:15 Baku time, political emigrant Vidadi Iskenderli died in a hospital in the French city of Mulhouse. His brother Oktay Iskenderli told Turan about this.

  2. The search at Farid Ismailov’s apartment has ended

    On the evening of March 6, a search was completed at the apartment of Toplum Tv employee Farid Ismailov, after which the journalist was handcuffed and taken away in an unknown direction.
